name: Afterlife Gladiator
description:
The Demo Days build for Afterlife Gladiator, a turn based RPG inspired mainly by Medarot's combat system that became something different over time.

Fight 3 v 3 battles against a wide variety of enemies and bosses as the protagonists try to escape from a Purgatory-like dimension where they are denied their respective afterlives and must instead participate on endless combat.
